title: Remove this retarded spell from ARAM
body:
Yeah, it was cool for a featured game mode, but considering how broken tanks are past 15min in ARAM, now you go and give them a true damage, SUPER LONG RANGE gap closer that only has a 20 sec cooldown?

Are Riot actually retarded, like seriously, do they not play their own game? Can someone send people to test if their designers are mentally handicapped?

replies.body:
(when the mark lands) my minds telling me nooo
but my BODY, MY BODY'S TELLING ME YESSSS
_you have been slain_

Don't quote me on this, but I read that Riot studied the differences between old ARAM and the Poroking ARAM mode and found that Poroking's Toss ability balanced out the game mode in terms of the melee champions that lack gapclosers. Some champions were just completely useless, either the whole game or from after a certain point.

The true damage is really negligible, is it like what, 10-20? 

I think I will have to agree on your point on the low CD though. I think it's a tad bit too frequent for offering such a wide gap closer. 
As for tanks, I think it renders champions likes Malzahar, Vel'Koz, Xerath more vulnerable in that they would have a far more difficult time dealing with Volibears and Shyvanas knocking them about.

I've also got some issues with the 20% CDR on Black Cleaver. It indirectly buffs all bruisers and their gapclosers by a lot. I'm aware that's a different topic.

And don't be so rude.

Yep, we're monitoring how the spell affects ARAM matches, with the CD being something we watch particularly close. Hopefully it'll bring more champ diversity and less picks where you auto-reroll because they are useless! Worst case scenario is it could result in a different set of champs bring really OP in the mode, but ideally it'll have a bit more positive of an impact than that :)

This ability could be fixed by letting the player throw the snowball every 20 seconds or whatever, but once it hits it goes onto a much longer (90 seconds or so) cool down, whether you choose to initiate or not.  The risk / reward ratios on this item are seriously skewed as it stands right now.  Essentially every single character now has a Malphite-Lite ultimate on a 20 second cooldown.  For characters with a very powerful close range kit that was traditionally held in check by gap closing issues, this breaks games.

But that punishes people from using the ability. It's not meant to be a damage source I don't think.
The punishing element of your Mark/Dash goes against Riot's philosophy.

no one is safe... now tanks dominate even harder... when they could already withstand some dmg, but now if you get dived on, and if u got no cc, its gg...
& actually, the true dmg increases per level (if you don't read the tooltips)

even with new allowed items, its the worse ARAM update, EVER.
you've ruined your only battle style game mode you had.... revert it effing BACK!!!

but if rito insists on keeping this crap spell, destroying the enjoyable battle mode, forever, then summary:
- increase cd
- shorten throw range
- remove true dmg

then maybe, it'll lower this truly op stupid featured spell
for now, probably have to not play ARAM for this patch, ffs... total bs.

(p.s. rito: in the pregame fast champ info screens, i cant read the tooltips per champ abilities anymore, usually i'll take a glance at it, if i've never played the champ before on ARAM, but i cant watch all the videos for abilities in the minute of load time??? zzz~ [still win XP here on this system for gaming]

- leung

I have no problem with this being in a separate game mode -- but adding this into standard ARAM has ruined it for me. This just takes a large element of skill out of the game.

It's giving an enormous advantage to bruisers and assassins, which can literally jump across the screen and kill you and then use their own jump, stealth abilities and/or flash to get away. Same thing with tanks and engaging.

It also makes it impossible to retreat. My team had lost a team fight (which an enemy Wukong initated via Mark) and were pulling out to get to our turrets (3 of us left), and despite us having some good distance between them (we'd normally be safe) -- their surviving team zips in with mark and kills us -- the Wukong (which initiated only 30 seconds ago), the ADC and mage.

I'd be happy if they lower the range and remove the true damage.

It is completely overpowered on some champions.
